title: Has anyone been employed/contacted by Riot by posting art here?

replies.body: There's also TBSkyen, but he was contacted because of his art for contracted work, not necessarily because he posted on these forums.

I'm really embarrassed that I've forgotten the persons name...
But DhaMa was a champion concept that was posted here and later went on to inspire Kindred's visual design.

So kind of.

I imagine most people that aren't affiliated with riot would submit their art to riot more privately, to avoid their hard work being stolen.
Thank you so much for the information :)

Well considering some of the League's idea originated from the community, I suppose some of them do get contacted by Riot for their League related artwork/suggestions.

Examples:

* Battle Bunny Riven (originally suggested under the name Bunny Girl Riven).
* Super Galaxy Rumble (originally suggested under the name Mecha Rumble, drew the same inspiration from TTGL series).
* Surprise Party Fiddlestick (name shared with original suggestion).
* The new Spellthief Lux's splash art (I think was originally a fan art that can be seen as [here](https://www.artstation.com/artwork/rXKVO). I believe the artist did end up being hired by Riot hence explains why the current splash's design is so similar to this fan art).
* El Tigre Braum (credited and acknowledged to be a fan suggestion. I can't seem to verify it though, as the link to the source on the LoLwiki put me to a scam site for some reason, and googling doesn't do the job either).

and maybe a couple more.
Thank you so much for the information :)
